document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.mainbody: '''''Domains of Delight''''' is a web supplement for the 5{{th}} edition adventure ''[[The Wild Beyond the Witchlight]]'', detailing the [[Feywild]] and giving tools for creating custom Domains of Delight and [[archfey]].

:{{Refonly}}
